sentences.en: a medieval ballad about a knight and a lady
sentences.cn: 一首关于骑士和贵族小姐的中世纪谣曲

sentences.en: He was able to pinpoint on the map the site of the medieval village.
sentences.cn: 他能在地图上准确找出那个中世纪村庄的位置。

sentences.en: Marriages in medieval Europe were customarily arranged by the families.
sentences.cn: 在中世纪的欧洲，婚姻通常是由双方的家庭安排的。

sentences.en: Medieval alchemists attempted to transmute base metals into gold.
sentences.cn: 中世纪的炼丹术士企图把贱金属炼成金.

sentences.en: Some medieval towns raced donkeys or buffaloes.
sentences.cn: 有些中世纪的城市用驴子或水牛竞赛.

sentences.en: The East Window is a wonder of medieval glazing.
sentences.cn: 东窗是中世纪玻璃安装工艺的奇迹。

sentences.en: The gallery is a treasure trove of medieval art.
sentences.cn: 这个画廊是中世纪艺术的宝库.

sentences.en: The house is a textbook example of medieval domestic architecture.
sentences.cn: 这所房子是典型的中世纪民居。

sentences.en: The leading role in the film is costumed in medieval armor.
sentences.cn: 影片中的主角穿着中古时代的甲胄。

sentences.en: the literature of the late medieval period
The museum has a fine collection of medieval ivories.
sentences.cn: 该博物馆收藏着一批精美的中世纪象牙制品.

sentences.en: The plumbing in this house is positively medieval
sentences.cn: 这座房子里的水管实在太陈旧了！

sentences.en: The same thing holds for the guild member in the medieval towns.
sentences.cn: 中世纪城市的行会市民,也是如此.

sentences.en: These spices were first brought to Italy from the East in medieval times.
sentences.cn: 这些香料最早是在中世纪时从东方被带到了意大利。

sentences.en: They were the forerunners of the medieval serfs.
sentences.cn: 他们是中世纪农奴的前辈.

sentences.en: This is a valuable medieval manuscript.
sentences.cn: 这是一本有价值的中世纪手抄本.

words.tran_cn: 中世纪的；原始的；仿中世纪的；老式的

trans.tran_en: connected with the Middle Ages (= the period between about 1100 and 1500 AD )
